title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: The item is a beautifully crafted spear, featuring an elegant emerald-green shaft adorned with intricate golden engravings. Its spearhead is striking, resembling a finely detailed leaf or a mythical creature's fang, set with shimmering gemstones that catch the light. This weapon radiates an aura of power and elegance, suggesting it is not just a tool for combat but also a symbol of prestige. The design hints at its usage in both melee and ranged attacks, making it a versatile addition to any adventurerâ€™s arsenal. Perfect for those who seek to blend beauty with lethality.
